Dear Sender ,

 

Thank you for your email .

 

I will be on Leave and I will be  unreachable on Wednesday April 29th .

 

I will have very limited access to both my phone and emails .

 

You can kindly communicate with your alternative contact at Marsh for any urgent request ,  or you may kinldy text me and I will revert to you at the earliest possible .

 

Best Regards,

Kev
